document.full_text: new "american idol" champion scotty mccreery hit no.1 on the itunes single charts on thursday, as fox television reported a 21 percent surge in viewers for the all country music finale of the long-running singing contest.
document.title: scotty tops itunes, "american idol" ratings surge
lines_and_colors: new "american idol" champion scotty mccreery hit no.1 on the itunes single charts on thursday, as fox television reported a 21 percent surge in viewers for the all country music finale of the long-running singing contest.
